ruleToc.chapterList: //获取卷名 jm=java.getStringList("div[class= col-sm-10 info-side] h2@ownText").toArray(); //获取书名 sm=java.getString("class.col-sm-12 text-center@h1@text",false); //获取分卷 sub=java.getElements("div[class= col-sm-10 info-side] ul").toArray(); for(var i=0;i'+sub[i]} //合并结果 sub=sub.join(""); a
